attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The man is NOT a british citizen, he visited the country and overstayed his visa, therefore he is an illegal alien and HAS NO RIGHTS.  He should be deported immediately and the people of this country should be given an opportunity to sign up and stop having their taxpayer pounds wasted on a foreigner.

rejection.details: We will not accept petitions relating to third parties individual circumstances.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
